channel.title: CVE Feed for github.com/peterzen/goresolver -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for github.com/peterzen/goresolver -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-3347|2024-08-03T01:07:06.471Z -- github.com%2Fpeterzen%2Fgoresolver -- github.com%2Fpeterzen%2Fgoresolver
item.description: DNSSEC validation is not performed correctly. An attacker can cause this package to report successful validation for invalid, attacker-controlled records. Root DNSSEC public keys are not validated, permitting an attacker to present a self-signed root key and delegation chain.

item.title: CVE-2022-3346|2024-08-03T01:07:06.519Z -- github.com%2Fpeterzen%2Fgoresolver -- github.com%2Fpeterzen%2Fgoresolver
item.description: DNSSEC validation is not performed correctly. An attacker can cause this package to report successful validation for invalid, attacker-controlled records. The owner name of RRSIG RRs is not validated, permitting an attacker to present the RRSIG for an attacker-controlled domain in a response for any other domain.
